
	-==-

Modified Subaction - Self Damage/Heal
- updated version of this code, with no static overwrites https://smashboards.com/threads/new-melee-syntax-school-you-can-write-character-commands-now.402587/#post-19190895
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x80072C14 --- 80840000 -> Branch

88A40001 A0840002
8063002C 2C050001
40820024 3CA08006
60A5CF5C 7CA803A6
4E800021 3CA08007
60A52C3C 7CA803A6
4E800020 3CA08007
60A52C24 7CA803A6
4E800020 48000000

	-==-


Disable Tap Jump
- Uses Debug Menu flags to enable on a per player basis
- first code is disabling kneebend from tap jump
- second is disabling aerial jump checks for y-joystick
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x800cb4e0 --- 7C0802A6 -> Branch

3CA0803F 60A5A36C
80C3002C 88C6000C
1CC60004 7CC6282E
2C060001 40820010
2C040001 40820008
4E800020 7C0802A6
48000000

	-==-


Tag Team Mode - FALL at match start
- instead of normal warp-in entry
- only enabled for Slo-Mo Melee
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x80069330 --- 2C030000 -> Branch

3C808048 88849D30
2C040012 40820014
3C808006 60849344
7C8803A6 4E800020
2C030000 48000000




	-==-


Tag Team Mode - Zelda/Sheik Copy Flags
- copy Tag Team flags between transforming character data structs
- no check for Slo-Mo only...shouldn't matter
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x8007f0d8 --- 901D00D0 -> Branch

901D00D0 801F21FC
901D21FC 881F0618
981D0618 48000000




	-==-
